function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 due to SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare facilities, interruptions in regular health services, vulnerability of healthcare personnel","Mitigation":"Vaccination campaigns, strict adherence to health protocols, increased healthcare resources","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, telemedicine","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general public","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Travel restrictions and control","Impact":"Negative effect on economies, obsolescence of certain jobs, increased unemployment","Mitigation":"Gradual lifting of restrictions, economic support for affected sectors, retraining programs for affected workers","Technologies":"Online job platforms, retraining software, remote work tools","People":"Workers in affected industries, government, job seekers","Owner":"Government, private sector"},{"Description":"Guidelines on social distancing","Impact":"Closure of schools, isolation of cities, restriction of public interactions, disruption of regular lifestyle","Mitigation":"Promotion of remote learning, support for isolated communities, adoption of virtual communication tools","Technologies":"Online education platforms, virtual meeting software, community support apps","People":"Students, teachers, residents of isolated areas","Owner":"Government, educational institutions, community organizations"}]}
